task.title: Viewing client certificates by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view client certificates in the truststore by using the list TrustedCertificate and list ClientCertificate commands on the command line.

context.p: You can view client certificates in the truststore by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to view client certificates in the truststore, see .

step.cmd: View client certificates in the truststore in one of the following ways:

choices.choice:
To view all trusted CA certificates in the truststore, enter the following command:
imaserver list TrustedCertificate

To view all trusted client certificates in the truststore, enter the following command:
imaserver list ClientCertificate
